name: transcripts_list_deprecated
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool seeking_alpha.
Tool description: Query for news, market moving, price quotes, chart, indices, analysis from investors and experts, etc...
API description: Fetches a list of transcripts for a specific symbol.

is_id.description: Symbol to query for data. Only one symbol can be queried at a time.

until.description: The value of meta/page/minmaxPublishOn/min JSON object returned to load the next page. Defaults to None.

size.description: The number of items per response. Defaults to 20.
